ModMetaData.name: Therapy (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Orion https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1076950211 Creative Commons Share-Alike License All the same; if the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
packageID of Orion.Therapy has been retained for compatibility purposes. Please unsub from the original mod for 1.6.
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
This mod allows you to let colonists do a "therapist" job. Build a therapy couch and a chair to create a therapy room.
If you use Colony Manager, you need to start a new colony if you want to use this mod. It required HugsLib.
